alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:46PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR CIMARRON COUNTY... At 746 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Keyes, or 14 miles southwest of Elkhart, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Boise City, Keyes, Griggs and Sturgis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
